name: Minion Masters
description: Dive into 1v1 - or bring a friend to 2v2 - battle in this dangerously addictive fast-paced hybrid of deckbuilder, MOBA, and tower-defense.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 240 or equivalent, minimum 512 MB of VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 6 GB available space
